documentation.text:
@title SafeMath
 @dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
@dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
@dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.

@title BUSDToken
 @dev this contract is a Pausable ERC20 token with Burn and Mint
 controlled by a central SupplyController. By implementing BUSDToken
 this contract also includes external methods for setting
 a new implementation contract for the Proxy.
 NOTE: The storage defined here will actually be held in the Proxy
 contract and all calls to this contract should be made through
 the proxy, including admin actions done as owner or supplyController.
 Any call to transfer against this contract should fail
 with insufficient funds since no tokens will be issued there.
DATA

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BetaDelegatedTransfer(address to,uint256 value,uint256 fee,uint256 seq,uint256 deadline)"

arguments.value: BetaDelegatedTransfer(address to,uint256 value,uint256 fee,uint256 seq,uint256 deadline)

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BetaDelegatedTransfer(address to,uint256 value,uint256 fee,uint256 seq,uint256 deadline)"

documentation.text: EVENTS

The constructor is used here to ensure that the implementation
 contract is initialized. An uncontrolled implementation
 contract might lead to misleading state
 for users who accidentally interact with it.
@dev To be called when upgrading the contract using upgradeAndCall to add delegated transfers
@dev Total number of tokens in existence
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

arguments.value: cannot transfer ownership to address zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "cannot transfer ownership to address zero"

documentation.text:
@dev Allows the current owner to begin transferring control of the contract to a proposedOwner
 @param _proposedOwner The address to transfer ownership to.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "can only disregard a proposed owner that was previously set"

arguments.value: can only disregard a proposed owner that was previously set

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "can only disregard a proposed owner that was previously set"

documentation.text: @dev Allows the current owner or proposed owner to cancel transferring control of the contract to a proposedOwner
@dev Allows the proposed owner to complete transferring control of the contract to the proposedOwner.
@dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
@dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
@dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

@dev Sets a new asset Protection role address.
 @param _newAssetProtectionRole The new address allowed to freeze/unfreeze addresses and seize their tokens.

@dev Freezes an address balance from being transferred.
 @param _addr The new address to freeze.

@dev Unfreezes an address balance allowing transfer.
 @param _addr The new address to unfreeze.

arguments.value: cannot set supply controller to address zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "cannot set supply controller to address zero"

documentation.text:
@dev Sets a new supply controller address.
 @param _newSupplyController The address allowed to burn/mint tokens to control supply.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Beta feature only accepts whitelisted delegates"

arguments.value: Beta feature only accepts whitelisted delegates

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Beta feature only accepts whitelisted delegates"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "cannot transfer zero tokens with zero fee"

arguments.value: cannot transfer zero tokens with zero fee

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "cannot transfer zero tokens with zero fee"

documentation.text:
@dev Sets a new betaDelegate whitelister.
 @param _newWhitelister The address allowed to whitelist betaDelegates.

@dev Whitelists an address to allow calling BetaDelegatedTransfer.
 @param _addr The new address to whitelist.

@dev Unwhitelists an address to disallow calling BetaDelegatedTransfer.
 @param _addr The new address to whitelist.

@title SafeMath
 @dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error

@title BUSDToken
 @dev this contract is a Pausable ERC20 token with Burn and Mint
 controlled by a central SupplyController. By implementing BUSDToken

 NOTE: The storage defined here will actually be held in the Proxy

 Any call to transfer against this contract should fail
